summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6115 for the improvement of 24th Avenue West from Emerson Street to West Bertona Street; by constructing watermains and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 84525, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
